data.title: Assessing progesterone receptor modulation in glioblastoma: from in vitro and animal model to a human pilot protocol
data.text_hl: Molecularly, GBs are characterized by isocitrate dehydrogenase wild-type (@GENE_IDH1 @GENE_3417 @@@IDH@@@-wt) status, @GENE_TERT @GENE_7015 @@@telomerase reverse transcriptase@@@ (@GENE_TERT @GENE_7015 @@@TERT@@@) promoter <m>mutations</m>, @GENE_EGFR @GENE_1956 @@@epidermal growth factor receptor@@@ (@GENE_EGFR @GENE_1956 @@@EGFR@@@) amplification and chromosomal alterations, while @DISEASE_Astrocytoma @DISEASE_MESH:D001254 @@@HGA@@@ are identified by <m>mutations</m> in isocitrate dehydrogenase 1 and 2 (IDH1-2), @DISEASE_ATR_X_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C538258 @@@alpha thalassemia/<m>mental retardation</m> <m>syndrome</m> X-linked@@@ (@DISEASE_ATR_X_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C538258 @@@ATRX@@@), @GENE_TP53 @GENE_7157 @@@tumor protein p53@@@ (@GENE_TP53 @GENE_7157 @@@TP53@@@) and cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitors 2A and 2B (CDK2A/B).

data.title: Targeting the microbiome in pediatric migraine: gastrointestinal manifestations and the therapeutic role of Bifidobacterium longum
data.text_hl: The taxonomies of denoised amplicon sequence <m>variants</m> (ASVs) were classified based on the EZBiocloud database.

data.title: Loss of Drosophila UBE3A phenocopies Piezo dysfunction and drives hyperphagic feeding in Drosophila.
data.text_hl: @DISEASE_Angelman_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D017204 @@@Angelman <m>syndrome</m>@@@ (@DISEASE_Angelman_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D017204 @@@AS@@@) is a rare @DISEASE_Heredodegenerative_Disorders_Nervous_System @DISEASE_MESH:D020271 @@@neurogenetic disorder@@@ characterized by @DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@developmental delay@@@, @DISEASE_Speech_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D013064 @@@speech impairment@@@, @DISEASE_Ataxia @DISEASE_MESH:D001259 @@@ataxia@@@, @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@<m>epilepsy</m>@@@, and in some cases hyperphagic feeding behavior.

data.title: The role of zinc homeostasis in major depressive disorder: heterogeneous pathological mechanisms and therapeutic implications
Diagnostic and clinical utility of exome sequencing and chromosomal microarray in children with GDD/iD: a meta-analysis
data.text_hl: Global @DISEASE_Intellectual_Disability @DISEASE_MESH:D008607 @@@developmental delay/<m>intellectual disability</m>@@@ (@DISEASE_Aphasia @DISEASE_MESH:D001037 @@@GDD@@@/@DISEASE_Intellectual_Disability @DISEASE_MESH:D008607 @@@ID@@@) is among the most common @DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@<m>neurodevelopmental disorders</m>@@@, with up to half of cases are attributed to genetic factors.

data.title: One pocket to activate them all (?): Efforts on understanding the modulator pocket in K2P channels
data.text_hl: <m>Mutations</m> near the SF of @GENE_KCNK4 @GENE_50801 @@@TRAAK@@@ (K2P4.1) are associated with @DISEASE_Facial_Dysmorphism_with_Multiple_Malformations @DISEASE_MESH:C565579 @@@facial dysmorphism@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertrichosis @DISEASE_MESH:D006983 @@@hypertrichosis@@@, @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@<m>epilepsy</m>@@@, @DISEASE_Intellectual_Disability @DISEASE_MESH:D008607 @@@<m>intellectual disability</m>@@@, and @DISEASE_Gingival_Overgrowth @DISEASE_MESH:D019214 @@@gingival overgrowth@@@.

data.title: Regulated degradation of KCC2, a potassium-chloride co-transporter required for synaptic transmission and neurodevelopment
data.text_hl: As outlined in the Introduction, <m>mutations</m> in @GENE_SLC12A5 @GENE_57468 @@@KCC2@@@ have been identified in multiple @DISEASE_Developmental_Disabilities @DISEASE_MESH:D002658 @@@<m>neurodevelopmental disorders</m>@@@, including @DISEASE_Schizophrenia @DISEASE_MESH:D012559 @@@schizophrenia@@@, @DISEASE_Autism_Spectrum_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D000067877 @@@<m>autism</m> spectrum disorders@@@, and @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@<m>epilepsy</m>@@@.

data.title: The ketogenic diet is not for everyone: contraindications, side effects, and drug interactions
data.text_hl: This higher prevalence is due to the increased rate of people carrying the pathogenic <m>variant</m> of the @GENE_HADHA @GENE_3030 @@@HADHA@@@ <m>gene</m>, responsible for the development of the disorder.

Additionally, <m>mutations</m> in @GENE_TRPV3 @GENE_162514 @@@TRPV3@@@ <m>gene</m> have been related to @DISEASE_Skin_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin diseases@@@ like @DISEASE_614594 @DISEASE_OMIM:614594 @@@Olmsted <m>syndrome</m>@@@, @DISEASE_Erythromelalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D004916 @@@erythromelalgia@@@, and @DISEASE_Keratoderma_Palmoplantar @DISEASE_MESH:D007645 @@@palmoplantar keratoderma@@@ (Lin et al., 2012; Duchatelet and Hovnanian, 2015; He et al., 2015; Larkin et al., 2021; Song et al., 2021; Um et al., 2022; Vasas et al., 2022; Lei and Tominaga, 2024).

data.title: Stem cell repair strategies for epilepsy
data.text_hl: Ongoing research into alternative therapies for @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@<m>epilepsy</m>@@@, such as @CHEMICAL_Cannabidiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002185 @@@cannabidiol@@@, the ketogenic diet, <m>gene</m> therapy, and optogenetic therapy, holds promise for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (Ghosh et al., 2023).
